      • enterCombat

        public void enterCombat(NPC opponent)
        This creates a combat loop between an NPC and a Character The loops ends when either the NPC or Character's health hits 0.
        Parameters:
        opponent - of type NPC

      • readMap

        public void readMap(java.lang.String file)
             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        The Read Map fucntion inputs a file name and parses the file looking for : to split into fileInfo to then put into rooms. Once the rooms are created from the read map then the player can move on to playing the game.
        Parameters:
        file - of type String file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
